content: universal star flower designer aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2 designs©2014 size 12 square using hook h/5 0mm yarn red heart ww in 2 colors a & b ______________________________________________________________ notes bold print repeated in pattern sts work in next st/chsp join join w/slip_stitch in beg st unless otherwise stated ___________________________________________________________ abbreviations & stitches used beg=beginning chain=chain slip_stitch=slip_stitch single_crochet=single_crochet space=spaces skip=skip w/=with double_crochet=double_crochet st s =stitch es lps=loops fpdc=front post double_crochet fpsc=front post single_crochet treble_crochet=triple crochet beg corner= ch3 double_crochet ch1 2dc corner= 2dc ch1 2dc round 1 w/a ch4 15dc in 4th chain from hook join in top of ch4 16dc round 2 ch3 fpdc in joining st ch2 skip­1 double_crochet fpdc in next double_crochet repeat around ending w/ch2 skip­1 & join 8dc 8fpdc round 3 ch1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next st 2sc in next space single_crochet in next 2sts repeat around ending with a 2sc in last space join & fasten_off color a 32sc aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2designs ©copyright 2014 all rights reserved universal star flower 1 note when you see the skip­2sts these are the two single_crochet that were done directly over the skipped sts of round 2 in the space round 4 w/b join behind work in any skipped st of round 2 ch5 counts as treble_crochet ch1 skip­2sts see note above single_crochet in next 2sts ch1 treble_crochet behind work in skipped st of round 2 ch1 repeat around minus last treble_crochet join 8trc 16sc round 5 ch3 double_crochet ch1 2dc in joining st beg corner made single_crochet in next single_crochet fpdc in double_crochet of round 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet fpdc in double_crochet from round 2 2dc ch1 2dc in next treble_crochet corner made repeat around minus last corner join 48dc 16sc round 6 ch1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next st 3sc in next space petal tip skip­double_crochet single_crochet in next 2sts fpsc in next fp st single_crochet in next st fpsc in next fp st single_crochet in next 2sts repeat around ending w/a fpsc in last st join & fasten_off b 80sts note no single_crochet sts from round 6 are skipped all stitches will be worked into round 7 w/a join in middle single_crochet of any 3sc tip ch1 3sc in same st single_crochet in next st +fpdc in next double_crochet of round 5 single_crochet in next st fpdc in next double_crochet of round 5 + single_crochet in next 5sts repeat +to+ once more single_crochet in next st 3sc in next st repeat around minus last 3sc petal tip join 128 total sts round 8 slip_stitch in next single_crochet ch3 4dc in same st petal tip double_crochet in next 2sts fpdc in next 2fpsts together single_crochet in next 5sts fpdc in next 2 fp sts together double_crochet in next 2sts 5dc in next st repeat around minus last 5dc join & fasten_off a 88dc 40sc this next round will only be worked in top of the fpdc sts there is a video explaining this as well https //www youtube com/watch v=r8okxo74dsy&feature=youtu be round 9 w/b join
